scripts.build: npm run build:next && npm run build:umd && npm run copy
scripts.build:umd: ngc -p src/tsconfig.json --target es5 --sourcemap && rollup -c -o dist/eang.umd.js -f umd -n eang --sourcemap
scripts.copy: cpx "build/**/*.{json,ts,map}" dist && cpx src/package.json dist && cpx README.md dist
scripts.playground: concurrently "npm run build" "npm run playground:build" "browser-sync start --config bs-config.json --no-open --no-ui"
